ðŸ“– Summary: Claude Squad is a terminal application designed to manage multiple AI coding agents, such as Codex, Claude Code, and Aider. It enables users to run tasks in the background, manage instances from a single terminal, and review changes before applying them. Each task operates in an isolated Git workspace to prevent conflicts.
